tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE plant_traits (
  trait_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  genetic_marker VARCHAR(255),
  trait_name VARCHAR(255),
  plant_species VARCHAR(255),
  trait_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Plants (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_name STRING,
  trait STRING,
  marker_id STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Traits (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trait_name STRING,
  description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticMarkers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  marker_name STRING
)

CREATE TABLE MarkerAssociation (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  marker_id STRING,
  trait_id STRING
)
